message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We can adjust in future rounds if you think it's unfair.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice.  How about a 55/45 split? This accounts for the time value of money with inflation.
I understand your point about inflation. Let's split the money equally this time.  We both get the same amount, and we avoid further inflation eroding our gains.
